attributes.action: Suspend MP's pay as they incapable of executing the will of the people on Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
New referendum - we had one and you haven't carried out yet,

Cancel Brexit - because most MP's voted remain and want to avoid carrying it out, 

Customs union 2.0 with free movement which was one of the key things people wanted to stop, 

Public inquiry - why? So we can kick the can  years down the road and hope we all forget?

General election - it won't break deadlock it is just a tactic.

When anyone else is unable to carry out their job they are not paid or are sacked so why not these?
attributes.background: MP's have been following their own agendas rather than the mandate given to them to leave the EU. Rather than work in the interests of the country they continue to   enforce what they want, including cancelling Brexi or another referendum which is pointless as they just want a different answer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
